title: Cube of a number
description: Write a programme to find cube of a number
contentHtml:
Write a programme to find cube of a number

Input  : 2
Output : 8

// Write a Java programme to find cube of a number

import java.util.Scanner;

class CubeOfNumber {

  public static void main(String[] args) {
    Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
    System.out.print("Input  : ");
    double input = sc.nextDouble();
    System.out.println("Output : " + cube(input));
    sc.close();
  }

  private static double cube(double num) {
    return Math.pow(num, 3);
  }
}


// Write a programme to find cube of a number
using System;

namespace Codinasion.Programme
{
    internal class CubeNumber
    {
        static void Main()
        {
            var input = GetInput();
            var output = Cube(input);
            Console.WriteLine($"\n{input} cubed is {output}");
        }

        private static double GetInput()
        {
            double? input = null;
            Console.Write("Please input your number to find the cube of : ");
            while (input == null)
            {
                var consoleInput = Console.ReadLine();
                if (double.TryParse(consoleInput, out double parsedInput))
                {
                    input = parsedInput;
                }
                else
                {
                    Console.WriteLine($"Unable to parse input {consoleInput}");
                }
            }
            return input.Value;
        }

        private static double Cube(double input)
        {
            var cubedNumber = Math.Pow(input, 3);
            return cubedNumber;
        }
    }
}


<?php
// Write a programme to find cube of a number

$num = readline("Input  : ");

echo "Output : " . $num * $num * $num . "\n";


#Programme to calculate the cube of a given number

function cube(edge)
  println(edge^3)
end

cube(2)


// Programme to calculate cube of a number in go

package main

import (
	"fmt"
)

func main() {

	var num int

	fmt.Print("Enter the Number to find Cube = ")
	fmt.Scan(&num)

	cube := num * num * num

	fmt.Println("\nThe Cube of a Given Number  = ", cube)
}


// Write a programme to find cube of a number

function cube(number) {
  return Math.pow(number, 3);
}

const x = 2;
console.log("Input  :", x);
console.log("Output :", cube(x));


// Write a programme to find cube of a number
#include <stdio.h>

int main()
{
  int number = 0;
  printf("Enter an integer: ");
  scanf("%d", &number);

  int result = number * number * number;

  printf("\nInput  : %d", number);
  printf("\nOutput : %d\n", result);
  return 0;
}


// Write a programme to find cube of a number

#include <iostream>
#include <math.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    double number;

    cout << "Input  : ";
    cin >> number;

    cout << "Output : " << pow(number, 3) << endl;

    return 0;
}

// Code contributed by : @isobarbaric (Krish Shah)


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Write a programme to find cube of a number


def cube_of_number() -> None:
    """Returns the cube of a number"""
    n = int(input("Input  : "))
    print("Output :", pow(n, 3))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    cube_of_number()
